description: A BridgeInstallation is a permanent part of a Bridge (inside and/or outside) which does not have the significance of a BridgePart. In contrast to BridgeConstructiveElements, a BridgeInstallation is not essential from a structural point of view. Examples are stairs, antennas or railways.

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the BridgeInstallation.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the BridgeInstallation.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the BridgeInstallation.

properties.name: lod2Geometry
properties.description: Relates to a 3D geometry that represents the BridgeInstallation in Level of Detail 2. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod3Geometry
properties.description: Relates to a 3D geometry that represents the BridgeInstallation in Level of Detail 3. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4Geometry
properties.description: Relates to a 3D geometry that represents the BridgeInstallation in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4ImplicitRepresentation
properties.description: Relates to an implicit geometry that represents the BridgeInstallation in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.
